remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged.PropertyChanged> event can indicate all properties on the object have changed by using either `null` or <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType> as the property name in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyChangedEventArgs>.
